name: Ghost Writer
description:
Help Ghosty stay alive in this endless runner typing game hybrid.

If you're having trouble typing, please make sure you're not holding shift, or any other modifier key (Alt, Control, Windows, etc).

Type Start to Start the game.

To Move, type the word floating above the lane you would like to move to.

Press Backspace to clear the word you're typing.

You get coins every 250 points. Spend your coins in the ~Shop~.

Type Shop to open the shop menu. From the shop menu, you can type the name of each hat to buy it/equip it, Clear to remove your current hat, or Close to exit the shop window.

Developer Highscore is 18622.

If you're encountering a Screen.Orientation.Lock error, please download and try the stand alone builds for windows.
